For this project, I used the 'Student Performance in Exams' data set from Kaggle. 

This project understands how student performance (test scores) is affected by other variables like Gender, Ethnicity, Parent level of Education, Lunch, and Test Preparation Course.

Data Source: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/spscientist/students-performance-in-exams?datasetId=74977

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/shifapanjwanii/stud_pred_R
